jobs.title: Specialista vendite e marketing
jobs.description:
Ruolo: Specialista Vendite e Marketing

Riepilogo delle caratteristiche del ruolo: Il ruolo di Specialista Vendite e Marketing è cruciale per il successo del progetto. Questa figura avrà il compito di identificare, contattare e coinvolgere gestori di attività commerciali, promuovendo la nostra applicazione web innovativa. Inoltre, sarà responsabile di sviluppare e implementare strategie di marketing per aumentare la visibilità e l'adozione della nostra applicazione web. La posizione richiede una combinazione di competenze comunicative, capacità di vendita, e una profonda comprensione del marketing digitale e del mercato locale.

Cosa serve per riuscire nella posizione: Per avere successo in questo ruolo, è necessario avere eccellenti capacità di comunicazione, sia verbale che scritta, e un approccio proattivo nella ricerca di nuove opportunità di business. È fondamentale essere in grado di stabilire relazioni di fiducia con i gestori delle attività commerciali e convincerli del valore... aggiunto della nostra applicazione web. Inoltre, è essenziale avere una solida conoscenza delle strategie di marketing digitale, delle campagne pubblicitarie e delle analisi di mercato.

Come si inserisce nel quadro complessivo dell’azienda: Lo Specialista Vendite e Marketing si inserirà come una figura chiave per l'espansione del nostro mercato e l'aumento della nostra visibilità. Il suo contributo diretto nell'acquisizione di nuovi gestori di attività commerciali e nella creazione di strategie di marketing efficaci è essenziale per la crescita e il successo della nostra applicazione web. Oltre agli specialisti di vendita e marketing, sto cercando sviluppatori web per formare un team dinamico e multidisciplinare.

Responsabilità:
• Identificare e contattare gestori di attività commerciali per promuovere la nostra applicazione web.
• Stabilire e sviluppare i requisiti della base di utenti per i sistemi in produzione, per garantire la massima usabilità.
• Condurre presentazioni e dimostrazioni dell'applicazione web ai potenziali clienti.
• Mantenere relazioni continuative con i gestori delle attività commerciali per garantire un alto livello di soddisfazione.
• Raccogliere feedback dai clienti e collaborare con il team interno per migliorare costantemente l'applicazione web.
• Sviluppare e implementare strategie di marketing per aumentare la visibilità e l'adozione della nostra applicazione web.

Qualifiche:
• Eccellenti capacità di comunicazione verbale e scritta.
• Esperienza pregressa nel ruolo di agente di vendita, specialista marketing, o in posizioni simili.
• Capacità di lavorare in modo indipendente e di gestire il proprio tempo in modo efficiente.
• Familiarità con le tecniche di vendita e negoziazione.
• Attitudine proattiva e capacità di risolvere i problemi.
• Preferibilmente, una buona conoscenza del mercato locale e delle esigenze delle attività commerciali.

Se sei interessato a unirti al nostro team e contribuire al successo di un progetto innovativo, ti invitiamo a candidarti! Stiamo anche cercando sviluppatori web, quindi se hai esperienza in questi campi, non esitare a contattarci

jobs.title: curricular internship import-export
jobs.description:
Company Description

With its five product lines of compact hydraulics Bosch Rexroth Oil Control SpA, with factories in the province of Modena and Reggio Emilia and over 1,300 employees, has been producing and marketing compact hydraulic components for multiple applications for over 40 years, from aerial platforms to cranes, earth-moving machinery, agricultural machinery, industrial applications.

What characterizes Bosch Rexroth Oil Control S.p.A. is the ability to study customized solutions in relation to each specific customer requirement. For this reason, the products of Bosch Rexroth Oil Control S.p.A. they are synonymous with quality and represent a guarantee for the global market.

In industrial hydraulics, Bosch Rexroth is actively shaping the transition from conventional to intelligent and connected hydraulics. This opens up enormous potential for the easy and economical integration of machines and systems into modern industrial environments.

Our R&D department based in... Nonantola (MO) is a center of global competence for Compact Hydraulic products

Job Description

The intern will have the opportunity to deal with the following activities:

Preferential origin: study of the topic through documentation (EU agreements, seminar documents, etc.);

verification of the preferential origin of DCOC products using the company's information systems (operating system, excel) and entering into contact with other company entities to find the various necessary information (e.g. CTG bill of materials and costings, product)

Made in: study of the topic through documentation (EU agreements, seminar documents, etc.);

verification of the made in of DCOC products using the company's information systems (operating system, excel) and entering in contact with other company entities to find the various necessary information (e.g. CTG bill of materials and costings, product)

Customs documents: explanation of what an export is and all the documents connected to it (sales invoices, applied VAT, customs bills, opening and closing of the export)

Dual use: study of the topic through documentation (EU regulations, seminar documents, etc.); support to determine the dual use of products

Miscellaneous Customs: anti-terrorist checks on customers, suppliers;

requests to customers for import documents for MRN administrative closure

Qualifications

master degree in Economics

Additional Information

If you feel confident in the position don't hesitate to apply

take a look!

www.bosch.com

www.boschrexroth.com

Bosch is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, national origin or ancestry, age, disability or any other protected class

Want to know how to live #LikeABosch?

Moving stories and inspiring interviews. Experience the meaning of "invented for life" by Bosch completely new. Visit our international website

jobs.title: Operatori di Cartomanzia
jobs.description:
''CASA DEI CARTOMANTI'' Ricerca operatori di cartomanzia da casa i consulti si svolgono comodamente da casa al telefono fisso. -le telefonate sono in entrata -viene garantito l'anonimato -non ci sono spese da sostenere -i pagamenti sono sicuri e superiori alla media -pagamento a minutaggio REQUISITI INDISPENSABILI - esperienza cartomanzia - propensione all'ascolto e buona dialettica
• Numero telefonico di rete fissa (NO cellulare)
• Connessione ADSL - rete urbana o telefono voip
• Partita Iva vetrinabakeca

jobs.title: PIZZAIOLO
jobs.description:
In New Job, leader nell'outsourcing alberghiero, ci dedichiamo alla creazione di soluzioni su misura e all'avanguardia. Unisciti a noi per scoprire un universo di opportunit , crescita professionale e per dare forma al futuro dell'ospitalit . Ricerchiamo figure e professionisti per strutture alberghiere in Sardegna, Sicilia, Toscana e Calabria, con l'offerta di contratti stagionali. Con New Job, il tuo talento contribuisce ad una visione innovativa. Posizione Il pizzaiolo Deve conoscere le qualit organolettiche dei prodotti a sua disposizione, gli impasti e tempi di lievitazione. Combina gli ingredienti in modo adeguato. Deve saper cuocere le pizze sia in forno a legna che in forni con altre fonti di calore (elettrico, gas o misto). Responsabilit principali: • Conoscere i fondamenti dell’HACCP. • Saper conservare in modo adeguato e alle giuste temperature, gli ingredienti. • Conoscere le varie tipologie di farine e le metodologie di lievitazione. • Rispondere alle richieste in modo... tempestivo e corretto. • Mantenere l’area di lavoro sempre ordinata e pulita. • Dirigere in modo adeguato e professionale i suoi collaboratori. Requisiti Competenze tecniche: • conoscenza approfondita delle tecniche di servizio Soft skills: • capacit comunicative e relazionali. attenzione ai dettagli e al cliente • capacit di lavorare in un ambiente dinamico Esperienza richiesta: • Almeno due anni di esperienza pregressa nel ruolo, preferibilmente in ristoranti. Cosa offriamo: • Regolare contratto CCNL • Retribuzione mensile di sicuro interesse • Vitto e alloggio a carico dell’azienda • Supporto continuo Altre informazioni Il presente annuncio è rivolto ad entrambi i sessi, ai sensi delle leggi 903/77 e 125/91, e a persone di tutte le et e tutte le nazionalit , ai sensi dei decreti legislativi 215/03 e 216/03 e successivi aggiornamenti vetrinabakeca

Informazioni sull’azienda:
NEW JOB ITALIA

Settore:
Altro/Non classificato

jobs.title: Specialista della qualità
Machine Operator
jobs.description:
Production Line Lead - Day Shift - 2-2-3 (non rotating)

Our client in Green Bay, WI is looking for hardworking, motivated talent to join their growing team. This client is expanding and needs to add aditional leaders to the plant! Don’t wait… apply today!

Whats in it for you?
• Day Shift - (2-2-3 non rotating)
• Paid training
• Full time hours
• Clean and safe work environment
• Growth Opportunities
• Temp to Hire

What will you be doing?
• Provide direction to crew members working on the line
• Ensure machines operate at optimal efficiency, minimize downtime
• Monitor quality of products
• Ensure that reporting data is collected and completed

What do you bring?
• Positive, can-do attitude
• Leadership Qualities
• Attention to detail
• Verbal and written communication skills

Why should you choose Manpower?
• Free training to upgrade your skills, including a free college tuition program
• Medical, dental, vision, 401k
• Weekly pay with direct deposit
• 24/7 Manpower customer care... support
• Dedicated Career Partner to help you achieve your career goals
• Voted #1 best places to work by Glassdoor 2021

Are you Interested?

Stop your job search and apply today! A recruiter will be in touch within 24 hours.

Share this job with friends and family and earn dollars with every successful hire.

ManpowerGroup recognizes the importance of providing an accessible and barrier-free environment. We are committed to creating a welcoming, fair and inclusive environment by offering equal opportunity to access our services. At ManpowerGroup, we are committed to providing accommodations, and will work with you to meet your needs

jobs.title: meccanico
jobs.description:
Randstad Italia, divisione technical di Perugia, ricerca un meccanico. Il lavoro si svolgerà nell'azienda sita nei pressi Magione, lavorerai con orario full time dal lunedì al venerdì.

Si offre contratto in somministrazione.

responsabilità

Il candidato selezionato verrà inserito all’ interno del team tecnico e dovrà occuparsi di:

- riparazione e manutenzione di veicoli industriali

- revisioni

- diagnostica meccanica e/o elettrica

- sostituzione componenti

esperienza

1 anno

competenze

Le competenze richieste per svolgere la mansione sono:

- diploma tecnico o scuola professionale in ambito meccanico

- capacità di problem solving

- buone doti relazionali

La ricerca è rivolta ai candidati ambosessi (L.903/77). Ti preghiamo di leggere l'informativa sulla privacy Randstad (https://www.randstad.it/privacy/) ai sensi dell'art. 13 del Regolamento (UE) 2016/679 sulla protezione dei dati (GDPR).

livello di studio

Diploma scuola superiore o Qualifica professionale

jobs.title: Young Talent Program - Logistics Intern
jobs.description: Job Description This is an amazing opportunity for a hardworking New Graduate/Master's student, interested in making a difference at Kraft Heinz! The position will be part of the Logistics Department in Milan, where you will join a passionate team, alongside peers always trying to reach the next level. Every internship in our Company offers outstanding opportunities to develop knowledges and skills, gain real business experience, get exposure to senior leadership and attend tailored trainings. As an intern you will take ownership of projects and work closely with the business on day-to-day challenges. We provide the playing field. You change the game. Are you up for the challenge? In brief, you will be responsible for: Support in the supply chain ares with reporting, data management and analysis; Supervising and reporting on network activities like stock management, deliveries and flows optimization; Detailed analysis of data process maps and problems; Development on efficiency... projects and improving performances and efficiency of our logistics network; Provide and verify service levels (KPIs); Provide ideas and follow projects for activities and process improvement. What we expect from you: Master's degree in engineering / business administration or similar (achieved or close to be achieved); High level of commitment and analytical thinking; Strong communication skills and independent way of working; Advanced command of MS Excel Proficient in English and Italian languages EU Working Permit (Orientation Year Visa not included) is required in order to proceed for this position. Professional Attributes Strong Affinity with data analysis looking to be trained in real business life conditions. We’re a very data driven company. You know how to translate complex data into a simple solution with your analytical attitude. Curiosity, positivity & passion - You’re curious, positive and enthusiastic. People know you as the driver of the team. Communication Skills - With us you’ll easily be exposed to senior management, no matter your level. Therefore, it’s meaningful to have excellent interpersonal skills, to deal with all kinds of different partners. Resilience - You don’t get easily stressed by pressure, on the opposite, a fast paced and dynamic environment is what keeps you energized. Phenomenal teammate - Achieving results is nice, but achieving results with the team is simply the best. You’re a team player, which means you’re sometimes a leader, sometimes a follower but always working towards the same common goal together with your teammates. What you can expect from us: An exciting 6-month internship (starting in July 2024) with challenging projects that you will independently run; A multifaceted and international work environment with leading brands; Regular feedback to continuously develop your professional and personal skills; Attractive and fair remuneration. The Recruitment Process Step 1: Application and Pymetrics Games Step 2: Phone interview with Talent Acquisition Step 3: Virtual Interview with the Line Manager and HR Location(s) Milano Kraft Heinz is an Equal Opportunity Employer – Underrepresented Ethnic Minority Groups/Women/Veterans/Individuals with Disabilities/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity and other protected classes. ABOUT US Kraft Heinz is a global food company with a delicious heritage. With iconic and emerging food and beverage brands around the world, we deliver the best taste, fun and quality to every meal table we touch. We’re on a mission to disrupt not only our own business, but the global food industry. A consumer obsession and unexpected partnerships fuel our progress as we drive innovation across every part of our company. Around the world, our people are connected by a culture of ownership, agility and endless curiosity. We also believe in being good humans, who are working to improve our company, communities, and planet. We’re proud of where we’ve been – and even more thrilled about where we’re headed – as we nourish the world and lead the future of food. WHY US We grow our people to grow our business. We champion great people who bring ambition, curiosity, and high performance to the table as the guardians of our beloved and nostalgic brands. Good isn't good enough. We choose greatness every day by challenging the ordinary and making bold decisions. All while celebrating our wins - and our failures – as we work together to lead the future of food. Challenging the status quo takes talent. We invest in your purpose and potential by developing skills and nurturing strengths that leave a legacy on our business and a lasting impact on your career. Because great people make great companies, and we’re growing something great here at Kraft Heinz. INCLUSION MATTERS TO US Everyone is welcome at our table. In fact, we thrive on learning and growing from our diverse backgrounds and perspectives. Doesn’t matter who you are, where you’re from, or who makes your heart sing. We want you to show up as your authentic self, excited to work with amazing colleagues to solve complex challenges and innovate in an ever-changing industry. We’re committed to: Hiring and growing talent from diverse backgrounds and perspectives. Growing our Business Resource Groups — vibrant, celebrated communities that enhance our business through thought leadership employee engagement and professional development opportunities. Providing our managers and leaders high quality learning experiences to explore how to foster inclusion and belonging
